src:
300 Kader NasDem Sumut ke Jakarta, Dukung Surya Paloh Jadi Ketua
06 Nov 2019, 04:05 by Mei Leandha, Juli Hantoro
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Sekitar 300 kader Partai NasDem Sumatera Utara akan datang ke Jakarta. Mereka akan ikut meramaikan perayaan Ulang Tahun NasDem sekaligus kongres yang digelar 8-11 November 2019.
Ketua DPW NasDem Sumatera Utara, Iskandar ST mengatakan para kader di wilayahnya tetap akan mendukung Surya Paloh sebagai Ketua Umum.
Alasannya, selain dinilai berprestasi menyatukan seluruh elemen dalam partai. Surya Paloh juga berhasil membawa NasDem masuk dalam empat besarpartai dengan perolehan kursi terbanyak di parlemen pada pemilu lalu.
“Dari 36 kursi jadi 59 kursi di DPR RI. Kami rasa masih bisa ditingkatkan kalau beliau kembali jadi ketua umum," kata Iskandar kepada Tempo, Rabu, 6 November 2019.
Sebanyak 300-an kader NasDem yang datang ke Jakarta itu berasal dari 33 kabupaten dan kota di Sumut. Mereka merupakan anggota dewan dan para kepala daerah yang akan menghadiri kongres tersebut. Tujuannya, memberi dukungan agar Surya Paloh kembali menjadi orang nomor satu di partai ini.
“Kami melihat Pak Surya Paloh bisa menyatukan semua keberagaman di NasDem, pengalamannya tidak diragukan lagi," kata Iskandar.
Pengalaman ini, kata Iskandar, yang akan dibawa pada Pemilu 2024 dengan target Partai NasDem jadi pemenang. Iskandar yakin, di bawah komando Surya Paloh bisa meraih semua target. Kalau sekarang 59 kursi, jika jadi pemenang harus 120 kursi lebih. Syaratnya, kata dia, cuma Surya Paloh dua periode dan kerja keras seluruh kader.
text:
300 North Sumatra NasDem cadres go to Jakarta, Support Surya Paloh as Chairperson
Nov 6 2019, 04:05 by Mei Leandha, Juli Hantoro
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Around 300 cadres of the North Sumatra NasDem Party will come to Jakarta. They will also enliven NasDem's Anniversary celebration as well as the congress held November 8-11, 2019.
North Sumatra DPD NasDem Chairman, Iskandar ST said the cadres in his area would still support Surya Paloh as General Chairperson.
The reason, besides being considered outstanding, is to unite all elements in the party. Surya Paloh also succeeded in bringing NasDem into the top four parties with the most seats in parliament in the last election.
"From 36 seats to 59 seats in the Indonesian Parliament. We think it can still be improved if he returns to become chairman, "Iskandar told Tempo, Wednesday, November 6, 2019.
As many as 300 NasDem cadres who came to Jakarta came from 33 regencies and cities in North Sumatra. They are board members and regional heads who will attend the congress. The goal is to support Surya Paloh to become the number one person in this party.
"We see that Pak Surya Paloh can unite all diversity in NasDem, his experience is no doubt," said Iskandar.
This experience, said Iskandar, will be carried out in the 2024 election with the target of the NasDem Party being the winner. Iskandar was convinced, under the command of Surya Paloh, he could reach all targets. If now 59 seats, if you become a winner must be 120 more seats. The conditions, he said, were only Surya Paloh's two periods and the hard work of all cadres.
